hero.title: Modern Time-Series Database Management Tool
hero.subtitle: Professional InfluxDB GUI client built with Tauri + React + TypeScript + Rust
hero.description: InfloWave provides an intuitive graphical interface for managing InfluxDB databases with high performance, security, and cross-platform support.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Download InfloWave today and experience the most intuitive way to manage your time-series databases.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for professional time-series database management

multiConnection.title: Multi-Connection Management
multiConnection.description: Manage multiple InfluxDB instances simultaneously with intelligent connection pooling and status monitoring.

objectStorage.title: Object Storage Management
objectStorage.description: Support for S3-compatible object storage connection management, including AWS S3, MinIO, Cloudflare R2, and more.

visualQuery.title: Visual Query Editor
visualQuery.description: Professional InfluxQL query editor with syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and result visualization.

charts.title: Advanced Charts
charts.description: Multiple chart types for time-series data analysis including line charts, bar charts, and custom visualizations.

dataImportExport.title: Data Import/Export
dataImportExport.description: Support for CSV, JSON, Excel and other formats with batch processing capabilities.

modernUI.title: Modern Interface
modernUI.description: Beautiful and intuitive interface built with Shadcn/ui components and responsive design.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Native desktop applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux with consistent user experience.

security.title: Secure & Reliable
security.description: Local data storage with encrypted connections and comprehensive error handling.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: Built with Rust backend for optimal performance and memory efficiency.

technicalSpecs.title: Technical Specifications
technicalSpecs.subtitle: Detailed technical information and system architecture

details: Simultaneous connections to multiple InfluxDB instances
Intelligent connection pooling and health monitoring
Support for AWS S3, MinIO, Cloudflare R2, and more
Line charts, bar charts, and scatter plots
Export charts as images or PDFs
Support for CSV, JSON, Excel formats
Responsive layout for all screen sizes
Native apps for Windows, macOS, and Linux
Built with Rust for optimal performance

ctaSection.title: Experience the Power of InfloWave
ctaSection.subtitle: Try all these features and more in the full version of InfloWave.

download.title: Download InfloWave
download.subtitle: Choose the right version for your operating system
download.noDownloadsDescription: Downloads are being prepared. Please check back later or visit GitHub.

installation.title: Installation Instructions
installation.subtitle: Quick setup guide for each platform

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Track the evolution of InfloWave with detailed release notes

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We value your privacy. InfloWave is a fully local desktop application

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: InfloWave is a desktop application that does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data to external servers.
items: No personal identification information is collected
No analytics or tracking tools are used
No data is sent to third parties
All data is stored entirely on your local device

localStorage.title: Local Data Storage
localStorage.content: InfloWave stores all configuration and connection information on your local device. This data includes:
items: InfluxDB database connection configurations (server address, port, credentials)
Object storage connection configurations (access keys and endpoints for S3-compatible services)
All sensitive information is encrypted and stored locally

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take multiple measures to ensure your data security:
items: All database connections use TLS/SSL encryption protocols
Locally stored credentials are protected with encryption algorithms
No credentials or sensitive information are sent to our servers
You can delete all locally stored data at any time

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: InfloWave may connect to the following third-party services, but only when you explicitly configure them:
items: Your configured S3-compatible object storage services
GitHub (only for checking software updates and downloading releases)
We do not share your personal information with these services

openSource.title: Open Source Transparency
openSource.content: InfloWave is an open-source project with fully transparent code:
items: Source code is hosted on GitHub and available for anyone to review
You can verify that the application does not collect or transmit your data
Community contributions and security audits are welcome
Licensed under the MIT open-source license

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us through GitHub Issues.
